tool.name: REVIGO: link
tool.description: Go to REVIGO with a list of GO terms
tool.help:
**Function:** Creates a link out to REVIGO for a given list of GO terms.
**Input:** A list of GO terms in text format
**Output:** HTML link to REVIGO
----
REVIGO article: Supek F, Bošnjak M, Škunca N, Šmuc T. "REVIGO summarizes and visualizes long lists of Gene Ontology terms" PLoS ONE 2011.
